item.title: An alcoholic bucolic frolic
item.author: Thomas Cunningham,
item.description: DramSoc’s spring term production of _Jerusalem, _directed by Grace Surman, opens with a young girl wearing fairy wings singing the eponymous hymn in the middle of the countryside. A peaceful scene until The Prodigy’s Invaders Must Die cuts in and a group of ravers rush onto the stage and scare the …
